comment: Excluding recurring CAPEX. Yearly production of 4Mt. Case 2B: 60% CO2 capture, uses a MEA solvent. Includes casting and rolling. Translated to ton of liquid steel using 1.086, conversion factor found in Vol3 Table C-2

Fixed O&M cost, divided by the production of 4Mt/yr. Case 2B: 60% CO2 capture, uses a MEA solvent. Includes casting and rolling. Translated to ton of liquid steel using 1.086, conversion factor found in Vol3 Table C-2

Fixed O&M cost (constitutes the majority of O&M expenses). Data was given in MUSD/yr, converted using a yearly production of 4Mt. Case 3, uses a MDEA solvent. Includes casting and rolling. Translated to ton of liquid steel using 1.086, conversion factor found in Vol3 Table C-2
